text: A computer system supports 32-bit virtual addresses as well as 32-bit physical addresses. Since the virtual address space is of the same size as the physical address space, the operating system designers decide to get rid of the virtual memory entirely. Which one of the following is true? A. Efficient implementation of multi-user support is no longer possible B. The processor cache organization can be made more efficient now C. Hardware support for memory management is no longer needed D. CPU scheduling can be made more efficient now gatecse-2006 operating-system virtual-memory normal ugcnetcse-june2012-paper3
